summary: Provides a class that implements the Pauli‑Transfer‑Matrix (PTM) representation of quantum channels, allowing conversion to and from array forms, composition, tensor products, and algebraic manipulations such as adjoint, conjugate, and transpose, as well as applying the channel to density matrices in the Pauli basis.
business_intent: Enable users of the Qiskit framework to model, analyze, and simulate quantum noise and operations efficiently using the PTM formalism, supporting interoperability with other channel representations and facilitating quantum algorithm development and error mitigation.
